hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="hibernate" published_version="5.2.15"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
#---------------------------------- #Install dependecies sudo zypper update -y && sudo zypper install -y git java-1_8_0-openjdk java-1_8_0-openjdk-devel libicu-devel libboost_locale1_54_0 perl-Encode-Locale gcc-locale glibc-locale
#Set Environmental variables export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib64/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version export JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS=-Dfile.encoding=UTF8 export _JAVA_OPTIONS="-Xmx10g" export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 #Download the source code git clone git://github.com/hibernate/hibernate-orm.git cd hibernate-orm git checkout 5.2.15
#Build mkdir -p $HOME/.gem/jruby/1.9 ./gradlew build -x :documentation:renderGettingStartedGuides -x :documentation:renderIntegrationGuide -x :documentation:renderUserGuide -x test
#Run testcases cp build.gradle build.gradle.org sed -i '254s/512M/1024M/' build.gradle sed -i '257s/2G/10G/' build.gradle git diff
./gradlew test -Dtests.haltonfailure=false --continue
